# default()

**Type Method**

Returns the default on-device index.

## Declaration

```swift
class func `default`() -> Self
```

## Return Value

The default on-device index.

## Discussion

If you want to use batching or you want to index items in a specific protection class, you need to use your own index (you can’t perform batch updates on the default index).

## Creating an index

- **init(name:)**: Returns an on-device index with the specified name.
- **init(name:protectionClass:)**: Returns an on-device index with the specified name and data protection class.

items.description: Returns an on-device index with the specified name.
items.name: init(name:)

items.description: Returns an on-device index with the specified name and data protection class.
items.name: init(name:protectionClass:)
